DayPicker.name: value
DayPicker.description: Sets the selected day ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps.

DayPicker.name: disabled
DayPicker.description: Disables all days from being selected, or given ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps from being selected.

DayPicker.name: once
DayPicker.description: Disables toggling off of already selected days.

DayPicker.name: highlight
DayPicker.description: Highlights the given ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamps as outlined.

DayPicker.name: timestamp
DayPicker.description: Sets the ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp of the calendar being listed.

DayPicker.name: max
DayPicker.description: Sets the maximum day timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the future that can be selected.

DayPicker.name: min
DayPicker.description: Sets the minimum day timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the past that can be selected.

DayPicker.name: sizing
DayPicker.description: Sets the size of children / spacing relative to the font size of the DayPicker.

DayPicker.name: calendar
DayPicker.description: Alters the calendar used for calculations / formatting via Temporal Calendar Codes.

DayPicker.name: locale
DayPicker.description: Alters the locale used for displaying internationalized text via RFC 5646 / BCP 47 language tags.

DayPicker.name: day
DayPicker.description: Alters how a displayed day is formatted.

DayPicker.name: weekday
DayPicker.description: Alters how a displayed weekday is formatted.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayPicker} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";
    const value = ["2021-11-05[u-ca=gregory]"];
</script>

<DayPicker
    palette="accent"
    width="content-max"
    {timestamp}
    {value}
/>
snippets.title: DayPicker Preview

    const disabled = [
        "2021-11-05[u-ca=gregory]",
        "2021-11-19[u-ca=gregory]",
    ];
</script>

<DayPicker
    palette="accent"
    width="content-max"
    {disabled}
    {timestamp}
/>

snippets.title: DayPicker Sizing

data.render:
DayPicker

DayPicker is a Widget that displays a calendar-style grid of days that a user can select from.

Imports

<script>
    import {DayPicker} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Disabled

You can disable all interactivity via the disabled property.

Disabled Days

You can disable specific days from being selected via the disabled property.

Multiple

You can allow for multiple days to be selected via the multiple property.

Once

You can disable selected days from being unselected via the once property.

Readonly

You can disable interactivity without changing the visuals via the readonly property.

Highlight

NOTE: By default, the current day is used.

You can select a specific set of days to be highlighted as outlines via the highlight property.

Maximum + Minimum

You can set maximum and minimum range of selectable days via the maximum / minimum properties.

Custom Format

You can customize how the day component of the available timestamps is displayed via the day and weekday properties respectively.

Sizing

You can alter the overall spacing / sizing look and feel via the sizing property.
